items.title: What’s More Dangerous than India’s Frequent Heat Waves? Heat Stress.
items.description: Women who face long-term heat exposure in workplaces and homes are finding it takes a heavy toll on their health and income.

items.title: 4 Dead After Suspected Migrant Boat Overturns Near a San Diego Area Beach
items.description: The boat capsized off the coast, officials said. Four people were taken to a hospital and one person was taken into custody.

items.title: How Many People Die in India From Hot Weather? Nobody Really Knows.
items.description: Officials have yet to grasp the magnitude of heat-related deaths, let alone effectively deal with the problem, public health experts and scientists sa...

items.title: Storm Pounds Southern California With Heavy Rains and Some Flooding
items.description: Evacuation orders were lifted in Los Angeles County after an unusually powerful storm brought heavy rain and prompted concerns about mudslides. At lea...

items.title: U.S. Border Patrol Launches Operation in Charlotte, N.C.
items.description: It is unclear how long the operation will last in North Carolina’s largest city, which has a growing immigrant population.
